menu.title: Menu 'Fitness'
menu.descr: The 'Fitness' menu is a new approach to cooking: more fresh vegetables and fruits. A product of active and healthy people. This is a completely new product with the best price and high quality!

menu.title: Menu 'Lenten'
menu.descr: The 'Lenten' menu is all about a careful selection of ingredients: no animal products, almond, oat, coconut or buckwheat milk, just the right amount of protein from tofu and imported veggie steaks.

menu.title: Menu 'Premium'
menu.descr: In the 'Premium' menu, we use not only beautiful packaging design, but also high-quality execution of dishes. Red fish, seafood, fruits - a restaurant menu without going to a restaurant!
